summary: Take a walk into the dreamlike world of filmmaker Raul Ruiz as he takes us to Paris for a twisting ride. Four strangely symmetrical stories unfold involving love, lust, crime, and time.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Anna Galiena|Marisa Paredes|Melvil Poupaud|Chiara Mastroianni|Arielle Dombasle|Féodor Atkine|Jean-Yves Gautier|Jacques Pieiller|Pierre Bellemare|Smaïn|Lou Castel|Roland Topor|Jacques Delpi|Jean Badin|Monique Mélinand|Bastien Vincent|Martine Borg|Agathe Bonitzer|Pascal Bonitzer|Marilyne Canto|Guillaume de Tonquédec|Luc Delhumeau|Nathalie Dorval|Antoine Fontenel|Claire Hammond|André Le Gallo|Oscar Monod|Teresa Ovídio|Robert Piallat|Marc Seclin|François Soule|Robert Lachenay|Julien Vialon|Andrew Wilson|Nanni Moretti
keywords: imaginary friend|multiple selves|university professor|voice over|little boy
title: Tres vidas y una sola muerte
